text:
Please apply this fix and rebuild and see if the problem is resolved.

text:
Assuming that the CVS commit JeffT mentioned in this PR fixed this.
If you're still seeing a problem, please reopen this PR.

Thanks for using Apache!
creator: jwoolley@apache.org
